website_summaries.verdict: A solid and inexpensive system that is backed by a company willing to help you troubleshoot problems.
pros: Creates a solid boundary that doesn't break
Works for dogs up to 150 pounds
Transmitter can handle up to 20 acres of land
Includes a shut-off after 10 seconds to help keep your pet from freezing in the correction zone
cons: Works for up to 3 dogs, but system only comes with 1 collar

customer_reviews.title: We are very disappointed but now stuck with it since it is buried
customer_reviews.text: Very inconsistent. We are very disappointed but now stuck with it since it is buried! Update: the company reached out to me and spent a lot of time walking me through many trouble shooting ideas and it is working well now!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Green

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! All I needed to do was put ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! All I needed to do was put the Resistor in the Loop Line and it worked like a Charm. Allen was superb in Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service best I've had in years product works great
customer_reviews.author: Angel Vath

customer_reviews.title: ... of fenced in yard and my new dog was like Houdini and was constantly getting out and to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am on 2 acres of fenced in yard and my new dog was like Houdini and was constantly getting out and to the road. I installed the "sit boo boo" wire completely around my fence and she hasn't gotten out yet. I upgraded to the remote control and can control Sophie with ease. She has become a pleasure to be around. I had a little difficulty getting the remote to work at first but one quick call to customer service and I was up and running. these folks really know their product and are extremely responsive. Thanks for saving my dog!
customer_reviews.author: woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Power adapter doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the kit and two extra collars...just installed the wire today and am charging up the collars. Installed the fence transmitter and find that the power adapter is broken. I’m going to look for another one at s store but I’m pretty much at a halt. Need to double-check these adapters before shipping...
customer_reviews.author: Linda Massimini

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much - it works with my super stubborn pit bull. I bought the remote trainer as well, which was a great decision. The instructions were a bit unclear to me, but their customer service was very responsive, polite, and informative. They helped me through things that were very clear once I went back and read the instructions fully. Don't think you are smarter than the instructions! Pay attention and read thoroughly and then do what they say. It's super easy once you actually follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: The chase is over!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a system with a solid boundary wire that wouldn’t break. Check. We wanted collars that could handle a bold husky and a timid spaniel. Check. And importantly, we didn’t want to chase our pups around the neighborhood anymore. Big check. Love this dog fence.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: I spent 2 days digging a trench and setting it ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent 2 days digging a trench and setting it up for nothing. The collar would not beep or vibrate before shocking. It would lock on a 10 second shock. I tried it myself 2 times the longest I could hold it on my neck was 3 seconds. I had no warning and I had to be standing on the wire before it activated. I called 2 vets who told me a 10 second shock is torture. I sent it back. I never covered the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Function Properly
customer_reviews.text: To this point I had Sportdog invisible fences, 3 of them in the past 7 years. They just don't seem to last and I have them properly protected in house. So when the last transmitter stopped working I decided to change brands for better luck. I spent the last 20 days trying to figure out what's wrong with this unit being familiar with all the trouble shooting from previous experience. The collar did not activate near the boundary wire with various attempts / adjustments or with the short loop test. I would however randomly activate within the pet boundary 20' from any wire. Under the circumstances I could not use the collar on my dog and returned the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity to collar
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of the flags. I think that they need to be brighter. The collar was not responding. There is a resistor that was recommended be installed so that there would be less interference, instead it created too much resistance. We were ready to send the unit back. Fortunately my husband has some knowledge of electrical circuits. He finally figured out that he had to remove that resistor because there was no connectivity to the collar. This information was not in the installation manual or instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Casey

customer_reviews.title: It does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fence months ago, when we first installed it, it did not work, I took the advice offered from Seller and some customers - those suggestions did nothing. So I gave up. This weekend we tried again, we did everything in the instructions and nothing! I am so discouraged and disappointed that I waited so long to set it up and now I cam out over $170 because I cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Trendy Dresser

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Never worked properly even with extensive and very meticulous setup. The collar would randomly go off within 20ft of the boundary, but not even with a beep first, just straight vibrations, then never even shocked. Or the collar would just do nothing, even with the box turned all the way up. We made sure to fully charge the collars and follow every step. We could touch the collar right to the fence and nothing. This is NOT a reliable safety net for your doggos. NEVER trust a wireless fence, instead make sure your doggo has a strong recall. Still waiting on refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: guarantee  works
customer_reviews.text: Pros - it works as advertised, and they stand behind the guarantee. My collar unit stopped working after 10 months and they replaced it quickly at no cost Cons - the wire has to be well (more than six feet) outside the containment space otherwise you can only operate it at minimum sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Really....

customer_reviews.title: Great product and wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fence for our 2 Great Pyr mixes. We have been using it for about 18 months and it works great! We trained the dogs to the fence and were expecting some issues as Great Pyrs have sooooo much under coat and are known to be stubborn. It works better than expected. 18 months after we installed it a lightning strike fried the transmitter. Customer service took care of us though. Very friendly and helpful folks. I would definitely recommend this product and would buy it myself again if the need arises. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Pogue

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!! They sent a new collar and it worked again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back at the end of November and after receiving it and installing, it seemed to work with my maybe 20lb dog. But now it’s january and my dog got out even though his collar was charged and almost was hit by a car. After running off for two hours, he came back. Just disappointed, that after all the good progress we had made with our running, I can no longer trust the system to do its job. Update!! So sit boo boo customer contacted me and talked me through what may have happen. They sent another collar that got here two days later. I synced it up with the system and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support, even outside the warranty period !!
customer_reviews.text: My system was purchased in early 2018. I had an incredible weather condition in Sep 2019 where rain, thunder and lightening like crazy hit my area. After the heavens cooled down a bit, I noticed the fence transmitter is beeping constantly, but the loop tested fine when I did a continuity test and a short loop directly on the transmitter did not stop the beep. Apparently the transmitter had taken a blow from all the lightening activity. So unfortunate! I reached out to Sit Boo Boo and I was well supported. They decided to give me a $50 discount on a new transmitter! So cool.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woodburn

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install but...
customer_reviews.text: So, I love this product and it stopped my 2 Houdinis dead in their tracks within an hour of installation. However, there was a bit of confusion on my inability to activate the second collar I bought, and the instructions included did not state that additional collars purchased have a different blinking light setting default than the one collar that comes with your purchase. Furthermore, calling customer service was a lesson in futility. But - look them on Facebook, send them an instant message and the response was almost instantaneous. So, the four stars are for lack of clarity on additional collars purchased and way less than stellar phone customer service
customer_reviews.author: md garrett

customer_reviews.title: Keep your fur babies in your yard safely with Sit Boo Boo!
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with my Great Dane puppy digging to the dogs next door. I gave Sit Boo Boo hidden fence a try! The first experience was when my wife ani I were installing solar lights on the block wall. The puppy cthrew her Mickey Miuse doll which landed at the wall. She came running until the fence vibrated and scared her. Last time she tested it! Now we have a 13 month Frwar Dane that also needs frainibg!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Dean

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is bar none
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 2 years ago and what a difference it made for me and my dogs life. Worked like a charm. 2 years later and I’m seeing a slight decline to battery called Alan at customer service and I got a call back on a Saturday. Truly remarkable product and customer service. I’m looking forward to many more years of using the product.
customer_reviews.author: cindy lamar

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: It can be tricky if anything is buried, or/and in my case I have electrical transformers in my back yard and buried cable along with an old house I guess that used to be on property but burned or got torn down. I would recommend also getting better gauge wire than what they send cuz 20 gauge you can bend just putting wear u want ant it will break. I do recommend it customer service is very refreshibg and definitely there for you. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Regina G.

customer_reviews.title: Best Training system ever!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this system to keep our dog from going out of the yard ....( he got out once and it took us a full day to find him!) Installed this system and it took one time of being shocked for him to learn not to go near the gate! We also purchased the hand held remote to train him from jumping on people and from going into my garden area ... again it took only a few times and he knows! I truly recommend this project to anyone and everyone!! The customer service is excellent and replaced a collar for us within our warranty time. I would purchase this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product, Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The system was easy to install and it works as advertised. When after eleven months the power adapter that feeds the signal generator stopped working, I contacted the company via the email link on their Web site, asking to purchase a new adapter. I was served immediately and wonderfully by John, a representative. My power adapter was replaced for free after only one day of messaging with John. I'm not used to this kind of service!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great underground dog fence
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the quality of the underground fence. This is our third underground fence we have installed over the years and moves, and by far this was the easiest and works the best. The collars are much nicer than others we have used and the straps are heavy duty as we have Dobermans. We bought extra wire and enclosed 6 acres for our dogs and it works great and the dogs love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Norvalls

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs each approximately 95lbs, Golden Retriever and chocolate Lab, 1 likes to dig under the fence. On the first audible tone and vibrate they got it. It did not take long to install around our 7,000 sq/ft yard, pretty simple and it was easy to adjust (I did have to re-read the directions and add the resistor). I would have given a 5 star, but I was hoping the collar would be a bit smaller, they are not that big and I really dont have a point of reference being I have only seen pictures of collars.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because many people left great reviews and the reasonable price. When I received it, I was not disappointed. It works flawlessly. Installation was easy. Instructions were well-written and complete. When I've spoken with customer service, they were incredibly responsive, friendly, and helpful. I was not expecting that at all. I've recommended this product to many people and will continue to do so. Buy with confidence. This company stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Great containment system
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Wired two acres, which was a bit of a chore. Cut channel for wire w hatchet, wife came behind me covering wire after I laid it in trench. Signal has been flawless. I adapted collar receiver to fit on a nylon web snap collar for easy on/off w pet, and always turn unit on before a trip outside, and off when we come back in.
customer_reviews.author: DW Dean SevenAcreSky

customer_reviews.title: after talking with customer service problems fixed
customer_reviews.text: My puppies keep running through the fence. It’s not consistent either. I’ve only heard one of them yelp one time running through. The rest of the time just run through like nothing happened. Update: called customer service and found out that I needed to add the resistor to my transmitter. Everything working like a charm now and my puppies won’t go near it . UPDATE: This company has awesome customer service. Had a lighting strike that fried my transmitter. They helped me and gave a big discount for a replacement. Awesome company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working for our 3 dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Used this system to replace our old Inotek. We did not have to replace the underground wire. Just switched out the control panel. We don’t bury our wire we use landscaping pins to hold the wire down. The grass eventually grows up over it. Had the system in place for 3 weeks now and have not had to recharge collars yet using just correction for yard. Wish box on collar was smaller but other than that all good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My only complaints are that the collar feels a bit cheesy- the band is hard plastic and I think something softer would be more comfortable for the dog. Also, the frequency or strength of the signal in the fence (not the collar) seems to fluctuate. Some days I can turn the fence down to 1 and it won't click, others days it needs turned up to 2 or 3. I'm wondering if this is because of temperature fluctuations? I loved the value of the device- although I did have to buy extra wire in order to cover my entire backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great company.
customer_reviews.text: The customer service at sit boo boo cannot be beat. I contacted them through the website and an employee called me shortly after and was extremely knowledgeable and helpful. After a lot of time spent researching the options, I'm so glad I chose this brand. The fence works great and our dogs figured it out really quickly just following the training guide that's included. It's given me peace of mind knowing that my dogs are safe at home and not escaping while I'm away.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We had a couple of escape artists in our household, and this has done the trick and they now stay in the yard where they belong. Set up was easy and training was easy. The instruction booklet isn't very well written and needs some improvement, but customer service was responsive and incredibly helpful. We are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Keltner

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service A+
customer_reviews.text: The collar has been working great. Keeps my 80lb Sheprador inside my 1 1/2 acre yard. I've had the containment system for about 6 months. However, after the last charge I could not get it to work. Sent a note to seller and asked if it was under warranty. Within two hours tech gave me a clue to what might be wrong. His suggestion fixed the problem and the dog is back under control and in the yard. Great Containment system and awesome service. Thanks John and Sit Boo Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Garner

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: takes a bit to install, but that's to be expected. We figured it out with a little extra help from customer service. Sit Boo Boo honored they're warranty when out first collar just stopped working and a second time when my overcharging was probably the culprit of the early death of the 2nd one. Every customer service guy has seemed educated and has been incredibly nice. SOOO although it might have said it in the manual I didn't realize the collar should only be changed for 2-3 hours. 5 stars for customer service. will buy from sit boo boo again.
customer_reviews.author: zd

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this system because i wanted a system which has solid wire that couldn’t be break. I wanted collars that could handle a bold husky and timid spaniel. And importantly i didnt want to chase our pups around neighborhood. So love this dog fence.
customer_reviews.author: Tahir Ali

customer_reviews.title: Will only buy Sit Boo Boo for all my electric fence needs!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this system for one dog. I didn't want to spend a lot of money, but wanted a quality system. I wasn't disappointed! I love the system. Although I had some installation issues (my operator error), Sit Boo Boo customer service was patient and helpful! I had the system up and running in no time! Since then, we have adopted another dog, bought another collar, and continue to love to Sit Boo Boo! The best part is the customer service! I honestly have never seen such great service from any company!
customer_reviews.author: angela hughes

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This invisible fence product is exactly what we need to keep our new Australian Shepherd within boundaries. I purchased a heavier wire for a long run making the area really secure. (Please read all instructions) After a perplexing issue with the fence, this company responded immediately to my phone calls and followed through until everything was completely resolved. Excellent product, reasonable price, Excellent Customer Service. Thanks! Jack
customer_reviews.author: Wineberry Farm

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have an intact male medium sized (50#) dog, and this unit works wonderful! It has stopped him from leaving the yard. I have a solid loop approximately 1400 feet in length. The collar lasts for weeks. Also, my power supply got hit by lightning, and they replaced it free of charge. They have been a wonderful company to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Everding

customer_reviews.title: Lab goes right through fence.
customer_reviews.text: This fence did not work at all for our Lab. He literally shoots right through it. Very disappointed. We’ve tried everything; adjusting the collar, making sure the fence was installed correctly, checking the battery life. We do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lori cheney

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: For the clever and mischievous dogs that can't help themselves. This product is a must! In every aspect Sit Boo Boo Electric hidden fence gets a 5 star review. Price: Very affordable. Installation: Easy. Instruction Manual: User friendly. Customer Support: Outstanding!! As a novice do-it-yourself guy. I'm very grateful for the person-to-person troubleshooting I received and the quick responses.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Deavers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products!! Outstanding company, with integrity
customer_reviews.text: This system is very easy to install. It is of high quality And workmanship. The unit has an audible alarm on it in case there is a break in the loop, “problem with the wire” Customer support is second to none.!!!!! I just wish all companies would show the same integrity and willingness to help their customers as this company does.... I DEFINITELY recommend this company, and will continue to do business with them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: chuck H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This product did wonders and it only took a few days for pandora (my fur baby) to understand where the boundrys were. It was super easy to set up. And it comes with a training guide to help teach you and your dog hoe to use the fence. My dog loves the freedom of being able to run around worry/yelling free. Cutomer support was also super helpful. The water proof cover on the collar for the charging port broke off and they sent me a new one within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: tawnya

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased their invisible dog fence a month ago, but didn't get around to setting it up due to a crazy schedule. My schedule included training my dog. After a couple weeks I realized I no longer needed the invisible fence. I contacted Sit Boo boo and they responded immediately. They have since followed up with return and refund information for me. I really appreciate their customer service even in the event of a return!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED!!  Excellent support.  So far keeping our shepherd/husky in the yard.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly simple. The user manual was a little confusing but the support was excellent. I had emails and phone calls returned within an hour even late in the day and on weekends. We have a very happy and excited German Shepherd / husky puppy who weighs about 85 lb. He was ripping fence boards off of our fence to get out and so far this fence has kept him in the yard. It's only been a couple of weeks but I am hopeful it continues. After 7 months, fence is still working great. Had to call support for one issue and it was fixed quickly. Best customer support from a company I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Working well for the past 4 months
customer_reviews.text: So far, the fence as worked well. I have a pretty strong willed and stubborn yellow lab and she has adapted well to the fence and knows her boundaries. Had an accident that resulted in the power supply cord being ruined which caused the boundary fence to no longer have power. Although it only took our dog a day to figure out the fence no longer had power and she was free to roam! But so far, I'm pretty happy with the performance of the fence and the quick response and actions from customer service providing me with another power supply cord!
customer_reviews.author: GWS

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t for our yard
customer_reviews.text: I guess if you have an open space it would work . We have too many power lines on one side of our yard and it would not send a signal . I moved then in five feet and it still didn’t work . I was only trying to do 200 square feet ..
customer_reviews.author: Amy LaBrecque

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This fence was easy to install & works great. Our box started acting up after about 8 months & quite working. This was likely due to a power surge. Even though this isn’t covered under the warranty, John from Sit Boo-Boo was able to get us a replacement for only shipping & handling charges. He also brought to my attention that adding a surge protector, $25 on Amazon, would avoid this issue in the future. Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: csarad

customer_reviews.title: does not work, poor service
customer_reviews.text: I have had this installed for 6 months and the collar will not correct the dog, I emailed the company and got a response to add a resistor, did that worked for a few days then nothing. I bought another collar and it worked for a few weeks and now if my dog walks very slowly nothing happens. I emailed the company got a response stating they would call and have not heard anything in a week.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Great Company
customer_reviews.text: The invisible fence has been great for our dog. We ended up purchasing extra wire to string it across 3 acres so that he has lots of room to roam. The collar unit is really designed to be dog-proof, which is nice. The unit also pairs with a training remote that is really handy. Note that the sealed nature of the collar means that pairing the two can be a bit tricky due to the close proximity required. (I ended up needing to position the antenna of the remote between the prongs of the collar)
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Trouble
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy unless you absolutely know what you're doing! It is super complicated to install and set up, needs outdoor outlet as well. We gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Some good,some bad.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the order and didn't get a collar or receiver I was obviously pretty disappointed,but you did promptly send me replacements,but you also promised a remote I never got,other then that I thought the wire quality was bad.On the good side it was relatively easy to set up and is doing what it was meant for including covering a large area of about 3 acres.
customer_reviews.author: jon gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This worked for about 1 year then began shocking my dog when he was nowhere near the fence line. He shakes at the sight of this collar now. Also, the machine beeps when it's plugged in & idk what's wrong with it. Waste of money & effort.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue dog that is climbing my 6ft privacy fence with two electric wires! Enter Sit BooBoo Electric Fence. I strung the wire on the bottom rail of my privacy fence, followed the directions for set up and Hemi (yes, as in "this thing got a Hemi?) now stays within the yard. We have had to make a few adjustments - he is a smart boy! Allan from Sit BooBoo customer support was excellent in identifying a couple of areas we adjusted. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Remote trainer has been a life saver for me!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my Sit Boo-Boo electric hidden dog fence and knowing that my dog is safe from the traffic. One of the best features of this system is the ability to use one collar for the fence and as a remote trainer. It does double duty and my pup is learning fast. Thanks for a great system and the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Love

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: This is our second fencing system, the first one was from a different company and just did not work out, issue being the collar would not hold a charge. This new unit is far superior and holds a charge for at least a week. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: brgteyes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, even Better Customer Service and Company!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to Install and customer service is great! Any time I have a question or need assistance Allan and his team always call me back. I would strongly recommend this product and company to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: CatCuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a few days
customer_reviews.text: Installed this fence to replace a broken old one. Plugged it in and it worked for 3 days. Now it doesn't work anymore. My dog thinks it's a joke now. I have tried to recharge the collar several times, I've checked the fence connections, etc. So irritating!
customer_reviews.author: SmylyMom

customer_reviews.title: *update. It works
customer_reviews.text: My dog has escaped twice. Update* The company sent me a replacement collar immediately and it works fine. The collar has held a charge and our dog has not left the yard. We aren’t sure what was wrong with the first collar but the company made it right and now we are very pleased with our system and would highly recommend it as it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Mitcham

customer_reviews.title: assist
customer_reviews.text: I have not installed it yet. I have very limited internet where I am and I am unable to download and print off the manual. It would be great if you could mail one to me. I am a senior citizen and live alone so it will take me a bit of time to get this done before snow flies.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have had this fencing for over a year now and it does a great job. We do not use it for when we leave, just when we are home and she wants to roam around outside. We live in the woods and have had elk and deer on the other side of her area and she has stayed within. Even when her favorite people come to visit, she wiggles and barks for them to come her way, and does not run over to them in the driveway. She does have her limits though... chipmunks. She just can not resist and will bull through for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jill O.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Took me a couple days to set it up and once I did it did not work. Sometimes the collar would vibrate when getting close to the wire but most of the time it didn’t. Walked my dog around the boundaries and I could only tell it vibrated a couple times. He went across the boundary multiple times and only shocked him once. The other times he did nothing to show it was working.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and easy install
customer_reviews.text: I had lost the remote and I contacted the seller they contacted me back the same day I reached out (actually within hours)and the discounted the replacement for me. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa W.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my hound who is an escape artist. He also has epilepsy and my vet thought this would be a good product for him since the initial correction is just a vibration. I would be careful not to overcharge it. I'd been charging it overnight and Allan with customer service explained that the collar should only be charged for 2 hours. Although I have own this product for over a year, Sit Boo-Boo has graciously agreed to send me a new collar without charge. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathlene M. Lima

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: So glad we got this! We have a very fast prey driven pointer and were concerned it wouldn't be strong enough, but it's worked great. He gets excited when we put it on and 8knows he can run freely on our property. Even after getting zapped a couple times...
customer_reviews.author: PANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Not good for bigger dogs or curious pups.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not good for a big dog. May be good to keep a small pet but not a young pup or a bigger dog. They run right through it.
customer_reviews.author: Tristy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Does not perform as claimed
customer_reviews.text: The receiver must be completely out of the elements but the range wont' work if receiver is behind walls - where the crap are you supposed to use this piece of junk then!? The wires leading into and out of the receiver are supposed to reach the collar but does not. This is a piece of junk, would not recommend this to anyone for any space!
customer_reviews.author: becc

customer_reviews.title: It’s good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two yorkies. It’s pretty easy to install but a little time consuming depending on how how big the area is and if your needing to block center areas off. I like the fence I just wish you could change the level of static correction that your dog gets. I also bought the remote and you can change the level of static correction with it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sammons

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but be sure you read all the instructions. Several different models are covered in the one booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage. You have to be 2 inches away from the wire for it to give any kind of signal and my dog is a Rottweiler so totally useless With his height in the color being around his neck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: there is no warning beep for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I finally installed it and there is no warning beep. I can't find a number to ask the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Hate it! Do not buy! We have installed it correctly and gone over it multiple times to make sure it was correct and it will just zap the dogs randomly in the middle of the yard or it won’t work and let them go over the line and then zap them after they are way past it even when they are walking.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: bad dogs
customer_reviews.text: i orderd this on amazon . i need to contain 2 dogs so i orderd 1 fencer kit and 1 extra coller and 1 hand held remote . the extra collar amazon sent was different and did not work with fencer kit.so i got in touch with the folks at sit boo boo . they sent me all new stuff within 4 days . the best customer service i have seen
customer_reviews.author: flannigan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!! Great buy!! 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not only a great value but high quality and the customer service is amazing. I had to contact them for a few hiccups on my part and received knowledgeable, polite and expedient service. I am recommending to all of my furry friend owners. Truly satisfied 100%
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: The fence works great and customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This fence system was easy to install and our dog responded beautifully. I have called customer service twice, once for a question and once regarding an issue. Both times I was asked to leave a message and someone would call back and they did! The issue was resolved and the question answered.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Burnette

customer_reviews.title: Not always dependable
customer_reviews.text: You never know when it will not work. Then Places that shouldn't give correction (because you wrapped the wire as per instructions), gives shocks at random. Leaves both the person and animal frustrated and confused. No more funds for a second choice. 🤔🤔😕😕
customer_reviews.author: Sugarbear Sugarbug

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The collar was shocking my dogs all over inside the house. I had to dial the field all the way down to 1 and, at this setting, the field was too small to keep the dogs away from the line in the yard. I bought this system to replace my Perimeter collars because they’re rechargeable. Looks like I’ll be going back to Perimeter.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product great sevice.
customer_reviews.text: Great product helped alot with the dog that will run when your back is turned. It worked for about 9 months. Then called them and they were happy to replace broken part. Great product great service
customer_reviews.author: Daron Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this fence for our dog Baker. We were able to install it in a couple hours and have not had any issues with it since! We love the long battery life since we don't have to worry about it losing juice on us in the middle of the day! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great product even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Works great and you cant beat the price. Highly recommend! Allan from sit boo-boo will literally spend hours on the phone with you to make everything right.
customer_reviews.author: CamillaLeeHill

customer_reviews.title: Love my Sit Boo Boo
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our fence in Sept 2018. Before the fence we had to keep our two year old boxer on a tether in our two acre lot. Now Sammie is able to completely use the whole two acres thanks to our Sit Boo Boo Fence. Not a very smart dog but she learned the fence very quickly and absolutely will not cross that fence. Nice to leave her outside all day on a nice fall day.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and great customer support from the mfg
customer_reviews.text: very easy to set up and works great for our lab. have had it for over a year now, just recently the battery would not hold a charge any longer. It was outside the warranty time frame but i called the mfg and they offered a replacement unit at a big discount and free freight. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W.

customer_reviews.title: Sit Boo Boo system
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog whom we have not be able to confine. We ordered another system and it did not work at all but sit boo boo did the job. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: b teese

customer_reviews.title: Great Systems
customer_reviews.text: Our 5yr old German Shepard needed some help correcting dog aggressive behavior. The Sit Boo-Boo team was very helpful with an excellent electric fence that was super easy to create. We didn't buy the hand-held controller at the time but should have. Just ordered it now also. Great service. Excellent products. Nikki the Shepard is doing MUCH better after just few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product solution & customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great solution if you don’t have a fenced yard, or if you want to take your dog in public without being pulled around by a leash. This was the Only thing that trained my very stubborn dog to stay within boundaries and follow commands. I’m very impressed with this system! Also the other best part is that it is affordable! You can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: very hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: The fence takes time to dig a line and set up. We also bought the remote and have not had any luck pairing the collar to the remote. Customer service is always busy and have not had a chance to get to talk to someone to help. The process has been long and frustrating and we still don't have a working fence.
customer_reviews.author: AZ kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Super customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this system installed for a year, and it has a 90% stopping rate (the 75 pound hound will run through if provoked, but he doesn’t like it). He stays in the yard nicely, and clearly knows his boundaries. More important, the customer service has been phenomenal. Whenever there has been a question or issue it has been excellent response time.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not quality
customer_reviews.text: Alarm works only sometimes indeed indicator lights stopped working after two weeks
customer_reviews.author: joe miller

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great service
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the service and product itself , hidden fences a are the way to go. Our Aussie got the hang of it in about a week, and the remote collar was a game changer. Alan and the staff are spot on, the only thing lacking are the easy instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Happy dogs, happy family!!!
customer_reviews.text: This system was easy to install and easy to setup. I upgraded to add an additional collar for my other dog and it was extremely easy to sync the collar with the system. Overall, it was worth the price. My dogs are extremely happy to be able to roam around the yard (1 acre).
customer_reviews.author: Janine Huffman

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE IS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This company is awesome. The customer service from Alan and John is the best I have ever had. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H

customer_reviews.title: Consistency in product
customer_reviews.text: We have a 70lb dog that can jump/climb 10+feet fencing and certainly enjoys the freedom once off our 1-1/4acre of land. It's been an incredible struggle. This seems to work!!!! FINALLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Gains respect of puppy
customer_reviews.text: The company stuck with us when the collar didn't seem to be shocking the dog consistently. Called in and John suggested trimming heavy hair around the neck, using the long prongs, and the resister made a huge difference. Very happy to have such good results. The company will stick with you til it works effectively. Only wish we hadn't waited so long to seek help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend this system to my fixed income grandmother.
customer_reviews.text: Fence, transmitter, and collars work as they should. One collar (out of 3) quit working properly and a replacement was immediately sent out. Customer service is OUTSTANDING. Should I ever need a new system I will be a return customer. Update: We had a lightening strike that fried our transmitter. I contacted the company and was immediately helped to get a new transmitter out the same day I contacted them.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and waranty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and we had a collar that stopped working and the customer service to get us a new collar was amazing!!!! And no problems anymore with the collar! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Sitton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the kit and had it up and runnng in 3 hours. I ordered an extra collar that had issues. I called the number on the instruction sheet and Alan sent a replacement collar that day. Very good product and support!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Super customer service, prompt shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! A little work initially but well worth the effort. Customer service is first rate. We had a lightning storm that blew my power supply and I called them to order one. Talked to customer service and they said they would ship one out free of charges even it was no fault of the product, Wow! I’ll most definitely be using them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The collar lasted a whole month before failing. I read the other reviews and thought it wouldn’t happen to me. Shoulda listened to the others who said the same. Trust me, don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davidson

customer_reviews.title: The Customer Service and  their Helpfulness was beyond all expectation!!
customer_reviews.text: With the incredible help and extreme patience; from Sit Boo Boo Representative, Allan, any problem I experienced was quickly resolved. The tone warning is so effective and my dogs do not want to approach the fence. This company has integrity and stands by their product.
customer_reviews.author: susan newby

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great training unit.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Didn't have to bury the wire to make it work. My dog got shocked pretty good when he got next to the fence the first time but, he learned the boundaries very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Worth the time and money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Takes time to bury the wire (if you are choosing to bury it). Battery life of the collar sensor is great. Good customer service. I had a question about installation. I left a message and they called me back in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works great awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I tried several options to contain my dog in our fence before purchasing one. Item works perfectly and as described. The collor did stop responding to the unit for a brief period and we contact customer service. The company immediately shipped a replacement. I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Lowery

product_meta.title: Sit Boo-Boo Electric Fence Advanced - Latest All Weather Pet Containment System - In Ground & Above Ground Installation - IPV7 Waterproof Collar for Pets Over 10lbs
feature_bullets: ELECTRIC DOG FENCE w/500 ft of industrial grade SOLID COPPER CORE WIRE. Can expand up to 20 acres of land
7 DIFFERENT CORRECTION SETTINGS plus BUILT-IN SURGE PROTECTION - Tone + Vibration + Static

WORKS IN FREEZING & BELOW ZERO TEMPERATURES PLUS 100% WATERPROOF - WEATHERPROOF IPV7 RATED COLLARS Completely submergible up to 3ft – Snow, Rain and muddy puddles are no problem for this rugged collar.
SUPPORTS UNLIMITED NUMBER OF COLLARS - Find additional collars here: https://www.amazon.com/Sit-Boo-Boo-Advance-Hidden-Fence/dp/B07MTSVC7G
1 YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTY: We are confident you will be completely satisfied with our dog training and containment system. Should something go wrong know that we will have you covered.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
